name: Genovese Crime Family
description: One of the 'Five Families' that dominate organized crime activities in New York City and New Jersey. Known as the 'Ive League' of the Mafia.

name: Gambino Crime Family
description: One of the 'Five Families'. Historically one of the most powerful crime syndicates in the US, especially under Carlo Gambino and later John Gotti.

name: Bonanno Crime Family
description: One of the 'Five Families'. Known for the Donnie Brasco infiltration and being kicked off the Commission for a period.

name: Lucchese Crime Family
description: One of the 'Five Families'. Known for their involvement in the garment district and major heists.

name: Colombo Crime Family
description: The youngest of the 'Five Families'. Known for three internal wars.

name: Chicago Outfit
description: The major organized crime syndicate in Chicago, distinct from the Five Families. Rose to power under Al Capone.
